2071.subject: HCOM
2071.descrlong: Introduces students in a service learning context to writing conventions, contemporary composition theories, and major forms of written expression such as expressive, interpretive, technical, rhetorical, argumentative, invitational, and creative. Offers built-in assessment in HCOM MLO 1. Meets the Single Subject in English Waiver Communication Skills Requirement. Requires successful completion of the ENGCOM ULR and Instructor consent. (Offered every year.)
